detail_desc: Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short flutter sleeves.

Trousers in a lightweight linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Set with a pair of mittens and a hat with earflaps in a fine knit. Hat with a pompom on top, ties under the chin and a fleece lining. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Size 0-2M and 2-6M without thumbs.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins), long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar. Chest pocket with piping, and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and wrapover front. Shorter at the front. Short lining skirt in jersey.
Bag in braided paper straw with two handles, a magnetic fastener at the top and two inner compartments. Lined. Size approx. 12x23x40 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Bomber jacket in shimmering, patterned satin with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt front pockets. Small, ribbed stand-up collar with a glittery edge, and the same ribbing with a glittery edge at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short lace top with a round neckline and short sleeves. Covered buttons at the back and a scalloped trim around the sleeves and hem. Satin lining.
Small wallet in glittery imitation leather with a zip and appliqués at the top and print motif on the front. Three inner compartments. Lined. Size 2x7.5x10 cm.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Paper straw hat with a band.
Short dress in a soft weave with frills, a V-neck and wrapover top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim. Unlined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with overlocked seams for optimum comfort. Slim Fit. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Nursing blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a unique nursing feature, round neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Jacket in soft faux fur with hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit viscose with a frill-trimmed collar in a cotton weave and long sleeves.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons at the top, long sleeves and decorative gathers at the shoulders and waist. Gathered yoke at the back, concealed zip in the side, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric, wrapover skirt. Partly lined.
Cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and shaped, tapered legs.
All-in-one suit in fine-knit thermal fleece with a lined hood and zips down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems that can be turned down over the hands and feet.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elasticated with a double flounce at the top and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining.
Short polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit fluffy yarn with short sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and a seam at the waist with buttons at the sides. Front and back pockets and concealed fasteners at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Soft slippers in a shimmering metallic weave with an appliqué on the front in the shape of a reindeer head. Velour linings and insoles and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Heart-patterned mesh socks with elasticated tops.
Gloves in soft, fine-knit cashmere with wide, ribbed cuffs.
Hair clip in metal with a large fabric bow. Size of bow approx. 15x16 cm.
Moccasins in a fine knit containing glittery threads with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims, a decorative elastic strap over the foot and soft suede soles.
Jumper in textured-knit wool containing some cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long skirt in woven fabric with a draped front, high slit and asymmetric hem. High waist with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Lined at the top.
Leather loafers with tassels and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2.3 cm.
Glasses with transparent plastic frames and clear lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in soft viscose jersey with short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Block-coloured jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with long, raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a fake fly. Front pocket, side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slightly shorter top in soft pointelle made from a viscose blend with short, rib-trimmed sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a turtle neck and long, wide sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, covered elastic at the hem and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a V-neck front and back, horizontal ties at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in one side. Pleats at the top, long, semi-transparent sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 40x200 cm.
Short running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband and reflective details.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Pleats and a detachable tie belt at the waist, large side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with visible seams at the knees.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a layer of lace at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Knee-length, A-line dress in jersey with a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Unlined.

Dress in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, short puff sleeves and a round neckline with a decorative scalloped trim. Decorative bow at the waist and a skirt in two layers of glittery tulle.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned, functional fabric with a wide racer back. Seamless.
Trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with fringes. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
